summary: I made this for my friend Usnex, he asked me to get create what he was going too, so this mod so far, adds in a shrine/altar north-east of Yngol Barrow, which holds The Nexus, an ancient artifact, that is said to contain the blood of three gods, Magnus, Lorkhan and Akatosh.
descriptionHtml:
[size=10][u][i][b]The Nexus[/b][/i][/u][/size]



[size=5]I made this for my friend Usnex, he asked me to create what he was going too, so this mod so far, adds in a shrine/altar north-east of Yngol Barrow, which holds The Nexus, an ancient artifact, that is said to contain the blood of three gods, Magnus, Lorkhan and Akatosh.[/size]


[size=5] There is a cult that worships The Nexus, they believe that it will bring them great fortune, and that on the passing of the moons, their shaman will become, a god. [/size]


[youtube]R02tc5IXgp4&list=UUqmTCYTbJb8KxzIMjRoZRAQ[/youtube]


The Video to this mod was made by AlduinV3 he is a cool guy please check his channel out on Youtube, there is a link down below, please subscribe to his channel, every little helps.

http://www.youtube.com/user/CaptainQuakerz?feature=watch







Mod Review = AlduinV3
Original Creator = Usnex
New Official Creator = Enoomnai
[color=red](I will not redeem myself to do that of which Usnex did and will not commit offense to copy right)[/color]
author: Enoomnai
